name: Bhamni.github.io
tagline: OpenSource Hospital Information System for low resource environments.
body: **Bahmni** project aims to build an open source hospital information system designed to be used in low resource environments. This system is envisioned to be built by integrating a multitude of open source applications such as **OpenMRS**, **OpenERP**, **OpenELIS** and **JasperReports** while building customizations and contributing back to the open source communities.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
